name: Dungeon Adventure (itch) (britnayc)
description:
This is my first game, a small platformer built in Phaser 3. All assets are mine, music and sounds are not (see below).

Controls: 

Left and Right Arrow to Move

Up Arrow to Jump

Space to fire picks

 

Music by julius_galla and sounds by LittleRobotSoundFactory and InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk)

All audio can be found on https://freesound.org/
